00026 class Yprintf {
00027 public:
00028     va_list ap;
00029     virtual ~Yprintf() {va_end(ap);}
00030     virtual void yputc(char c) { putchar(c); } // define yours *****
00031     void vaprintf(const char *fmt);

00035 class Ysprintf : public Yprintf {
00036 public:
00037     char* destination;
00038     Ysprintf(char* dest) { destination = dest;}
00039     virtual void yputc(char c) { *destination = c; destination++; *destination = 0; }
00040 };
